task: Develop a basic 'Galaga' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Don't be frightened of cliches'.
name: Star Squadron

branding_data.short_description: Star Squadron is a modern twist on the classic 'Galaga', embracing familiar elements with a fresh perspective.
branding_data.detailed_description: Star Squadron takes the beloved gameplay of 'Galaga' and enhances it with modern graphics and mechanics, while intentionally incorporating classic cliches to create a nostalgic yet refreshing experience. Players pilot a starfighter, battling waves of alien enemies in a vertical scrolling shooter. The game features power-ups, boss battles, and a variety of enemy types, all designed to evoke the charm of retro arcade games. By embracing familiar tropes, Star Squadron delivers a comforting yet thrilling space combat experience that appeals to both veterans of the genre and newcomers alike.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
